title: What Does The Church Need To Look Like In A Post Covid World | Unapologetic Episode 45
itunes:title: What Does The Church Need To Look Like In A Post Covid World | Unapologetic Episode 45
description: Covid has changed so much of how we live our lives. Bobby gives his thoughts on an article written by Thom Rainer that looks at what successful churches are doing despite the pandemic. https://www.christianpost.com/voices/12-traits-of-churches-doing-well-during-the-pandemic.html?fbclid=IwAR2kAQXWh9x-mTWkMLuZvz2YJgwc66ObKvTrc7Ti5RIl1wxt8qO63_p6nF0 Take the OMA Mental Health Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/mhcc Take the OMA Apologetics Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/acc https://www.patreon.com/oneminuteapologist
